pages.text:
Windward Isle RV and Mobile Home Park
A 55+ community located in Sarasota, Florida operated by 157 park shareholders.
Offering seasonal RV hookups.
No Dogs Allowed!
Getting to Know Windward Isle
Welcome to our vibrant community, meticulously designed for active seniors who crave the perfect balance of relaxation and excitement in their lives. So, go ahead and immerse yourself in the countless amenities we offer, and let the adventure begin!
Relaxing Pool area
Find relaxation in our heated, saltwater pool area with ample seating.
The clubhouse
Enjoy dancing, cards, pool table, ping pong, jam sessions and more.
Outdoor recreation
We have cornhole, shuffleboard, bocce ball, and pickleball.

Seasonal RV Rates
Updated March 2024
[Sold Out Through April 2024]
- We do not accept Good Sam, Passport America, or any other club membership.
- Starting january 1st 2025, incoming rvs must be newer than 15 years old.
January 1 - March 31, 2024
Daily - $75
Weekly - $490
Monthly - $1,300
May 1 - October 31, 2024
Daily - $65
Weekly - $375
Monthly - $800
April & November 1 - December 31, 2024
Daily - $70
Weekly - $490
Monthly - $1,000

50 Amp Services Available

Homes for Sale
Join our 55+ community by purchasing a home and becoming a shareholder.
Lot #253
⚫ Asking $210,000
⚫ 1972
⚫ 2 Bed / 2 Bath
⚫ Has been updated.
Call 941-662-7782 to make an offer.
RVs & Park Models for Sale
Lease an RV lot.
Lot #34
⚫ Asking $54,000
⚫ 2003 Franklin Park Model
⚫ New Central Air/Heat
⚫ Washer and Dryer Included
⚫ Newer Roof with Guarantee
⚫ All Furniture and 1 TV Included
Call 513-623-7535 to make an offer.
Lot #10
⚫ Asking $19,800
⚫ Salem Model, 2010
⚫ 1 bed / 1 bath
⚫New Awning and Screen
⚫ Full Size Fridge
Call 941-504-4333 to make an offer.
